mapper.select: SELECT CKDH, ( SELECT ZCXX02 FROM W_ZCXX WHERE ZCXX01 = w_ckd.ZCXX01 ) ZCXX02, ( SELECT CK02 FROM CK WHERE CK01 = w_ckd.SHCK ) CK02, w_ckd.CKR, DATE_FORMAT( w_ckd.CKSJ, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' ) CKSJ FROM w_ckd LEFT JOIN w_zcxx on w_zcxx.zcxx01 = w_ckd.zcxx01 WHERE 1 = 1 AND SHCK in (select ck01 from W_GSCK where ZCXX01 = #{ZCXX01}) AND CKDH = #{CKDH}

SELECT DISTINCT BARCODE, spxx04, spfl.spfl02, w_ckditem.CKSL, w_ckditem.RKSL, ( w_ckditem.CKSL - w_ckditem.RKSL ) ZTSL FROM w_ckditem LEFT JOIN w_ckdcm ON w_ckdcm.SPXX01 = w_ckditem.SPXX01 LEFT JOIN w_spxx ON w_spxx.spxx01 = w_ckdcm.SPXX01 LEFT JOIN spfl ON spfl.spfl01 = w_spxx.spfl01 LEFT JOIN w_ckd ON w_ckd.CKDH = w_ckditem.CKDH LEFT JOIN w_zcxx ON w_ckd.zcxx01 = w_zcxx.zcxx01 where 1=1 AND w_ckd.SHCK in (select ck01 from W_GSCK where ZCXX01 = #{ZCXX01})
AND w_ckditem.CKDH = #{CKDH}

select count(1) COUNT from (SELECT DISTINCT BARCODE, spxx04, spfl.spfl02, w_ckditem.CKSL, w_ckditem.RKSL, ( w_ckditem.CKSL - w_ckditem.RKSL ) ZTSL FROM w_ckditem LEFT JOIN w_ckdcm ON w_ckdcm.SPXX01 = w_ckditem.SPXX01 LEFT JOIN w_spxx ON w_spxx.spxx01 = w_ckdcm.SPXX01 LEFT JOIN spfl ON spfl.spfl01 = w_spxx.spfl01 LEFT JOIN w_ckd ON w_ckd.CKDH = w_ckditem.CKDH LEFT JOIN w_zcxx ON w_ckd.zcxx01 = w_zcxx.zcxx01 where 1=1 AND w_ckd.SHCK in (select ck01 from W_GSCK where ZCXX01 = #{ZCXX01})
AND w_ckditem.CKDH = #{CKDH})t

SELECT w_ckd.CKDH dh,group_concat(SPCM01) wr,null yr from w_ckd inner JOIN w_ckditem on w_ckditem.CKDH = w_ckd.CKDH LEFT JOIN w_ckdcm on w_ckdcm.SPXX01 = w_ckditem.SPXX01 where w_ckd.CKDH= #{CKDH} union SELECT w_rkd.CKDH dh,null wr,group_concat(SPCM01) yr from w_rkd inner JOIN w_rkditem on w_rkd.RKDH = w_rkditem.RKDH LEFT JOIN w_rkdcm on w_rkditem.spxx01 = w_rkdcm.spxx01 where w_rkd.CKDH= #{CKDH} GROUP BY dh

SELECT A.RKDH, A.SHCK, A.CKDH, B.CK02 SHCK_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(A.RKSJ, '%Y-%m-%d %k:%i:%s') RKSJ FROM W_RKD A LEFT JOIN CK B ON B.CK01 = A.SHCK LEFT JOIN W_GSCK C ON A.SHCK = C.CK01 WHERE 1 = 1 AND C.ZCXX01 = #{ZCXX01}
AND A.RKDH = #{RKDH}

SELECT count(1) COUNT FROM W_RKD A LEFT JOIN CK B ON B.CK01 = A.SHCK LEFT JOIN W_GSCK C ON A.SHCK = C.CK01 WHERE 1 = 1
AND C.ZCXX01 = #{ZCXX01} AND A.RKDH = #{RKDH}

SELECT w_spxx.SPXX04,w_goods.BARCODE,case when w_rkditem.HJBH='0' then w_spflhj.HJBH else w_rkditem.HJBH end HJBH,w_rkditem.SPXX01 from w_rkditem LEFT JOIN w_spxx on w_spxx.spxx01 = w_rkditem.SPXX01 LEFT JOIN w_goods ON w_goods.spxx01 = w_spxx.SPXX01 LEFT JOIN w_spflhj on w_spflhj.SPFL01 = w_spxx.spfl01 WHERE w_rkditem.rkdh = #{RKDH}
